STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Merfolk spells and Wizard spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

STATIC_ABILITY.FILTER: return ((FilteredCard():GetSubType():Test( CREATURE_TYPE_MERFOLK ) ~= 0 or FilteredCard():GetSubType():Test( CREATURE_TYPE_WIZARD ) ~= 0) and OwnedByYou() and InHand())
STATIC_ABILITY.CONTINUOUS_ACTION: if FilteredCard() ~= nil then FilteredCard():DecreaseCost( 1 ) end
